faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.iva_answer: No, the prices shown are net. 19% VAT is added to the electronic invoice issued by the SII.
faq.semestral_calculation: How is the semestral billing calculated?
faq.semestral_answer: The price is per active student per semester. Example: 100 students × CLP $35 = CLP $3,500/semester + VAT. Billed on the 1st of each semester.
faq.free_trial: What does the free trial include?
faq.free_trial_answer: 14 days of full access to the plan you choose, without restrictions. Includes guided tour by our team and complete support. No credit card required.
faq.plan_change_answer: Yes, you can change plans at any time. Changes apply to the next billing cycle.
faq.data_after_cancel: What happens to my data if I cancel?
faq.data_after_cancel_answer: You can export all your data at any time. After cancellation, we keep your data for 90 days according to Law 19.628, then it is permanently deleted.
faq.support_hours: What are the technical support hours?
faq.support_hours_answer: Monday to Friday from 9:00 to 18:00 hrs (Chile Continental). Premium plans include 24/7 support with guaranteed response time.
